Title: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of education and the regents of the university of the state of New York to study and improve Holocaust education within the state
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of education and the regents of the university of the state of New York to improve Holocaust education, make funds available for more Holocaust related events, conduct studies on Holocaust education levels, and to republish certain textbooks on the Holocaust.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing and directing the commissioner of education and the regents of the university of the state of New York to study and improve Holocaust education within the state
